column4: what is the proper way to install the Pidgin IM Client?  I don't see it listed in the repositories
Pidgin is still GAIM in Feisty, won't be pidgin until gutsy.
oh ok so I can just install GAIM from the repositories and it's actually the latest Pidgin?
no, Pidgin is v2.0 GAIM is last beta (beta 6) prior to the 2.0 release
